author: SteveL-MSFT
body:
For non-interactive use, we should think about the parts of PowerShell not needed to make it smaller/faster.  Examples:

1. the console and related assemblies like psreadline
2. auto-module loading/command discovery may not be needed (scriptanalyzer or tooling to explicitly import modules and fully qualified cmdlets)
3. remoting (client) may not be required, remoting server may not be required if PSRP not required
4. helpsystem not needed https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/3955
5. formatting/output not needed
6. intellisense not needed
title: Split PowerShell into components suitable for non-interactive/hosted use
